GapFillInput.Title: Personal pronouns and possessive adjectives: I/my, you/your, he/his and she/her
GapFillInput.Instruction: Choose a word from the pool to fill each gap. Type in your answers.

Content.Question:
1. His name’s David. He’s a footballer.
2. Her name’s Martina Hingis. She’s a tennis player.
3. He’s an actor. His name’s Johnny.
4. Her name’s Joss Stone. She’s a singer.
5. I’m a businessman. My name’s Jules Waterford.
6. You’re an actress. What’s your name? .
7. My name’s Thierry. I’m a police officer.
8. Frieda: What’s your name please? Bob: My name’s Bob.
9. She’s a businesswoman. Her name’s Anita Roddick.
10. He’s a waiter. His name’s Josh.
